alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Madison, southern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of I-75 At Exit 16 to 11 miles northwest of Madison to 15 miles east of Monticello. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Dasher, Lee, Twin Lakes, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, Hanson and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
